description: User interface solutions such as infinite scrolling, animating elements on scroll, or even the popular drag and drop are interesting interface solutions that have been around for a while. In this guide, Pearl Akpan analyzes the methods and properties that make these interfaces achievable, why an understanding of these methods and properties is relevant, and afterward, dives into some practical use cases for them.
